name: 張若菡
objective:
藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活需求，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.
